method.title: Method
method.measuredTooltip: Emission measurement based on internationally approved or corresponding method (direct/indirect, continuous/periodic or single measurement)
method.calculatedTooltip: Calculation of emissions with internationally agreed or corresponding national method (e.g. physical-chemical correlation, emission factor, mass balance)
method.estimatedTooltip: Expert judgement based on e.g. earlier measurements, studies or experience

classification.title: Type of waste
classification.HW: Hazardous waste as defined by Article 2(14) of the E-PRTR

descriptions.Facilities: You can search for facilities by using the map or the table and filter the list of facilities by industry sector, municipality or the name of the facility. Click the name of the facility to see information on emissions and waste transfers for the selected facility.
descriptions.emissionsToAir: Start browsing emission data by selecting the pollutant or gas. It is possible to filter the information by year or location. Information of a specific facility can be found under the facility search.
descriptions.emissionsToWater: Start browsing emission information by selecting ¬†the release substance. It is possible to filter the information by year or location.  Informaton of a specific facility, can be found under the facility search.
descriptions.wasteTransfers: Browse waste transfers by year or location. To find waste transfers of a specific facility use the facility search.
